title: Tingle Interview
overview: An unconventional interview where K-POP artists whisper in your ears begins!Forget all the interviews you've seen so far! Here's a unique interview in which the interviewee must answer all questions and requests in ASMR. Will it be possible to answer ground-breaking questions in ASMR? How about singing your part of the song in ASMR? Can you possibly hold back your laughter no matter how funny the situation is? This is an ASMR interview of K-POP artists where all of that is possible. Wearing earphones is a must while your ears tingle! But listening to this interview is also somewhat healing! Alongside the whispered interviews, other feel-good sounds are also presented.Wear your earphones and listen to this special ASMR interview to make you fall asleep.
